Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.

This planet is filled with resources and riches, but they are guarded by savages and dusty old remnants of the past. We should take up arms against these people so that the treasures of this world will be ours!
这颗星球非常富饶，但是却被野蛮人和古代余孽占领。只要我们战胜这些势力，这个世界的所有宝藏都将归我们所有！
Declare war on an NPC faction
向一个 NPC 阵营宣战
Kill {count} armies belonging to an NPC faction
击杀 {count} 支属于该 NPC 阵营的军队。

Extensive propoganda and indoctrination leads your troops to believe in their inherent superiority to the natives of this planet.[br/][br/]Units gain {moraleBonus}[happiness/] morale in battle against independent units.
铺天盖地的战前宣传和教育使你的部队深信他们是凌驾于这颗星球原住民的存在。[br/][br/]单位与独立单位战斗时获得 {moraleBonus}[happiness/]士气。
Receive a tier 1 unit at your capital colony.
你的首都殖民地获得一个 1 阶单位。
This world teems with life and opportunity. The natives here have a rich culture and could teach us much. We should send an emissary to make contact with these people and begin a new era of peace!
这个世界满是生命与机遇。当地居民文化悠久，存在着很多值得我们学习的地方。我们应该派遣一名密使与他们进行沟通，将和平交往提至新的阶段！
Do {numQuests} quests for an NPC faction
为一个 NPC 阵营完成 {numQuests} 个任务
Achieve Peace with an NPC faction
与一个 NPC 阵营达成和平
Hiring a dedicated team of xenologists aids your communication with the natives on this planet.[br/][br/]You get {bonusPercentage} more influence[influence/] from quests.
雇佣一支外星学家特别小组帮助你与这座星球上的原住民进行沟通。[br/][br/]你从任务中获得的影响力[influence/]增加 {bonusPercentage}。

The colony that we have built is just the beginning, the first step on the road to our mighty empire. Our focus should be on construction and growth; the colonies we build now are the bedrock of our future!
虽然我们的殖民地建造工作刚刚开始，但却是我们建立伟大帝国的第一步。我们应该专注于建造和经济增长；我们现在建造的殖民地就是美好未来的基石！
Add a sector to your capital
By employing specialist teams of architects, we can build much faster than normally.[br/][br/]Colony structures require {percentage} less [production/] production to build.
雇佣建筑师专家团队后，我们可以更快的速度进行建造。[br/][br/]建造殖民地建筑物所需的[production/]减少 {percentage}。
A free colonist [population/] appears in one of your colonies.
一名自由的移住民[population/]出现在了你的一个殖民地中。
Others have come to this world to steal its treasures and horde its secrets. This must not stand! Send forth your armies to punish these thieves and claim what is rightfully yours!
有其他人来到了这个世界，他们要盗取这里的宝藏，发现这里的秘密。绝不能允许这种事情发生！派遣你的军队征讨这群窃贼，夺回本该属于你的东西！
Enter a war with another player
Kill {count} units belonging to another player
击杀 {count} 个属于另一玩家的单位

By dedicating resources to the creation of detailed training simulations against the armies of our foes, we will ensure our forces have the upper hand in battle.[br/][br/]Units gain {moraleBonus}[happiness/] in battle against other players.
我们在以敌方军队为对手的对战模拟中投入了大量的资源，使得我们的军队在战斗中更加得心应手。[br/][br/]单位对抗其他玩家时获得 {moraleBonus}[happiness/]。
Receive a tier 2 unit at your capital colony.
你的首都殖民地获得一个 2 阶单位。

We are not alone on this world: others have come to share it with us. We should make contact with them, make peace with them! From peace comes friendship, and from friendship comes unity, and united we shall make this planet our own!
我们并不是这个世界唯一的存在，其他外来者也想从中分上一杯羹。我们应该与他们取得联系，并与他们交好！和平产生友谊，友谊产生联合。联合统一，我们将统治这个星球！
Sign a Non-Aggression Pact with another player
与另一玩家签订互不侵犯协议
Maintain a peaceful relationship for {numberOfTurns}[turn/] consecutive turns
连续 {numberOfTurns}[turn/]回合维持和平关系

A well-funded and dedicated diplomatic core is essential to our mission on this planet, and will ensure that others always see us in the best light.[br/][br/]You gain {opinionBonus} opinion with other players.
资金充足、专心致志的核心外交思想对我们完成在这个星球上的任务至关重要，也能保证其他人始终以积极的眼光看待我们。[br/][br/]你从其他玩家处获得 {opinionBonus} 评价。
All your colonies instantly gain {happinessAmount}[happiness/] happiness.
你的所有殖民地立刻获得 {happinessAmount}[happiness/]幸福值。

We have our armies, with boots on the ground and guns in their hands. But there are other ways, subtler, safer and smarter. It is time we explored our options on this planet. If we out-think our foes, then the battle may be won before the first shot is fired.
虽然我们手握军队、装备和枪械，但比起战争，还有许多更稳定、更安全且更聪明的方法。是时候向这个星球传达我们的想法了。如果我们想到对手所想，就能不战而屈人之兵。
Research any Covert or Strategic operation
研究任意隐秘或战略行动

A coordinated, cross-governmental operational command can see massive savings in the deployment of agents and other assets.[br/][br/]Covert and Strategic operations now cost {discountPercentage} less energy.
一个协调且跨政体的行动指令能够节省大量特工部署和其他资源。[br/][br/]隐秘和战略行动的能量消耗降低 {discountPercentage}。

The engines of our war machines are nothing without the engines of industry and economy. We have land and colonies, but we could have so much more! It is time for us to find ways to fully exploit this world, so that we might gain riches beyond imagining.
没有工业和经济支撑的战争机器什么也不是。我们已经拥有了许多土地和殖民地，但我们还可以获得更多！是时候找寻方法充分开发这个世界了，我们将拥有超出想象的财富。
Research any Resource improvement in the Economy tree
在经济树中研究任意资源提升
将一个区域升级至等级 {requiredLevel}

Careful market manipulation and a state-controlled economy lead to a healthy, growing tax income.[br/][br/]Basic structures built in your colonies now give {basicIncome} additional income of their resource.
谨慎操控市场并发展国有经济，使税收维持健康的增长状态。[br/][br/]你殖民地内建造的基础建筑将额外提供 {basicIncome} 资源收益。

If a man with a spade could build a hovel, imagine what he might build with all the tools that technology provides! It is time for us to give our armies the tools that they need to build our glorious new empire!
如果人类拿着铲子就能搭建一个简陋的住所，想象一下，如果他持有当前技术水平能够提供的一切工具，那么他的建树能有多大！是时候给予我们军队所需的工具了，让他们打造出我们辉煌的新帝国！
Research any Unit Mod or Tactical Operation
研究任意单位模块或战术行动
Apply unit mods to {count} separate units
为 {count} 个不同的单位应用单位模块
在战斗中使用 {count} 个战术行动

By embedding specialist support personnel with our armies, we can better coordinate our tactical strikes.[br/][br/]Gain {TcOpPoints}[castingtactical/] Tactical Operation points.[br/]Tactical Operations are {discountPercentage} cheaper to use.
通过派遣专家支援我们的军队，我们能够更好地协调战术打击。[br/][br/]获得 {TcOpPoints}[castingtactical/] 战术行动点数。[br/]使用战术行动的消耗降低 {discountPercentage}。
Your commander recieves a random hero item.
你的指挥官获得一件随机英雄物品。

We have worked hard to forge friendships with the peoples of this world, and it is time for us to reap the rewards of our labors. We should use our newfound influence to learn secrets, hire mercenaries, and to sign treaties that will give us allies in times of war!
我们为了与这个世界的居民建立友谊付出了许多，是时候领取回报了。我们应该利用新获得的影响力探寻秘密，招募雇佣兵，签署能够在战争时期给予我们盟友的协议！
Sign a Friendship Pact with a faction
与一个阵营签订友好协定
从一个阵营购买 {count} 件物品

Advanced market analysis combined with xeno-psychological assessments of our partners allow us to always get the best deals when trading.[br/][br/]Items bought from Dwellings cost {discountPercentage} less [influence/].[br/][br/][firecol]Dwelling Shop discounts can never exceed {MaxDiscountPercentage}[/firecol]
将先进的市场调查与我们合作伙伴的异星心理评估相结合，我们始终都能在交易中占据上风。[br/][br/]从居住地购买物品所需的[influence/]消耗减少 {discountPercentage}。[br/][br/][firecol]居住地商店折扣不能超过 {MaxDiscountPercentage}[/firecol]

Scattered, the people of this world are weak, but with our patronage and guidance, they can become so much more! We should invite our friends to join our great nation, so that we can share of their strength, and achieve our true potential together!
这个世界的住民不懂团结，软弱无力，但在我们的资助与指引下，他们将变得更强大！我们应该邀请好友加入这个伟大的国度，这样我们就能共享力量，共同释放我们真正的潜能！
Buy {count} dwellings from an NPC faction
从一个 NPC 阵营购买 {count} 个居住地

A policy of multicultural integration, leads to mutual respect and understanding, both on the battlefield and off it.[br/][br/]All NPC faction units gain {moraleBonus}[happiness/] morale, {healthBonus}[hp/] and {damageBonus} extra damage.
多元文化融合的政策带来了互相尊重与理解，无论是在战场之上还是战场之下。[br/][br/]所有 NPC 阵营单位获得 {moraleBonus}[happiness/] 士气、{healthBonus}[hp/] 和 {damageBonus} 额外伤害。
This unit has {moraleBonus}[happiness/] morale, {healthBonus}[hp/] and {damageBonus} extra damage.
该单位拥有 {moraleBonus}[happiness/]士气、{healthBonus}[hp/]和 {damageBonus} 额外伤害。
A small army of NPC faction units appears at your capital colony.
一小支 NPC 阵营单位军队出现在了你的首都殖民地。

Too long have we allowed our rightful heritage to be occupied by rogue AIs and alien rabble. It is time for us to reclaim these worlds for ourselves, and our first step is to capture the dwellings where these creatures nest.
我们的合法遗产被可恶的人工智能和外星渣滓占据已久，是时候夺回属于我们的世界了。我们要做的第一步就是占领那些生物的巢穴。

Use psi-ops and propoganda to spread wild rumours and tales about the terrifying combat prowess of your generals.[br/][br/]Your commander and heroes gain [abilityblue]Terrifying Reputation[/abilityblue], which causes all enemy units to suffer a {moralePenalty}[happiness/] penalty.
使用灵能行动和宣传手段散布谣言，大肆宣扬你手下将领们的强大战斗力。[br/][br/]你的指挥官和英雄获得[abilityblue]可怕名声[/abilityblue]，使所有敌方单位受到 {moralePenalty}[happiness/]惩罚。
A small army of racial units appears at your capital colony.
一小支种族单位军队出现在了你的首都殖民地。
All enemy units suffer {moralePenalty}[happiness/] morale while this unit is in combat.
当该单位战斗时，所有敌方单位受到 {moralePenalty}[happiness/]惩罚。

Knowledge is power, and what power we have to show to you. Set your agents loose on our foes, seek out their secrets, sabotage their strength. We shall fight a war in the shadows, to ensure our victory in the light!
知识就是力量，我们必须向你展示这种力量有多强大。向敌人派遣特工，探寻他们的秘密，削弱他们的力量。为确保正面战场的胜利，我们将在阴影中作战！
使用 {count} 个不同的隐秘行动

Set up a body to unify intelligence and military agencies to share knowledge and coordinate operations.[br/][br/]You gain {strengthBonus}[operationStrength/] operation strength and {defenseBonus}[operationDefense/] operation defense.
建立组织整合情报和军事机构，分享知识并协调行动。[br/][br/]你获得 {strengthBonus}[operationStrength/]行动力量和 {defenseBonus}[operationDefense/]行动防御。
Gain a powerful item that allows your heroes to make an army invisible.
获得一个能使军队隐形的强大物品。
The friendships we have forged are strong and bountiful, but they could be so much more! It is time for us to forge alliances, to build a great coalition, a new Union that can stretch to the stars!
我们建立的友谊坚固而丰富，但仍能更进一步！是时候继续结交盟友，实现伟大的联合并建造一个能够冲出群星的全新联盟！
Make an alliance with {count} different players
与 {count} 个不同的玩家结成同盟
Maintain an alliance for {count} consecutive turns
连续 {count} 个回合维持同盟

By assuming a utopian stance of harmony and unification, your reputation rises and your armies are inspired to perform incredible feats.[br/][br/]All your units gain {moraleBonus}[happiness/] morale and you gain {ReputationPositive}[reputation6/].
通过建立乌托邦式的和睦与统一，你的声望获得了提高，你的军队也受到了激励，能够做出奇迹般的功绩。[br/][br/]你的所有单位获得 {moraleBonus}[happiness/]士气，你获得 {ReputationPositive}[reputation6/]。
Edit: reputation typo fix, raises --> rises

Until now, we have been one amongst many, but it is time for us to prove our greatness to the weaklings who would take this world from us. We shall crush their armies, raze their colonies, and build our empire upon their ashes!
虽然如今的我们仍然默默无闻，但现在正是向那些夺走我们世界的杂碎展示我们实力的时刻。我们会粉碎他们的军队，将他们的殖民地夷为平地，然后在他们的废墟上建起自己的帝国！
Defeat {count} players by capturing their capitals or killing their commanders
以占领首都或击杀指挥官的方式击败 {count} 名玩家

Dedicate the entirety of your empires resources to the concept of victory through war.[br/][br/]You have an extra {PopularSupportIncrease}[popularSupport0/] Popular Support while this Doctrine is active.
你的帝国为了胜利已然破釜沉舟。[br/][br/]该教义生效时，你额外获得 {PopularSupportIncrease}[popularSupport0/] 民众支持。
An army of racial units appears at your capital.
一支种族单位军队出现在了你的首都殖民地。

This world remains blanketed by the darkness of ignorance, but our studies are beginning to reveal a greater truth. It is up to us to use this knowledge to build a mighty edifice, a beacon that shines with the light of salvation!
这个世界仍被无知的黑暗所笼罩，但我们的研究已经窥见了伟大真相的面纱。我们要用这份知识建起宏伟的建筑，一座能够散发出救赎之光的灯塔！
Unlock your Secret Tech's Doomsday weapon
解锁你秘密科技中的末日武器
Build a Doomsday structure in one of your colonies
在任意一个殖民地中建造末日建筑
The energy cost of Doomsday structures and Operations is reduced by {percentageDiscount}.
末日建筑和末日行动的能量消耗降低 {percentageDiscount}。
All your colonies instantly gain {happinessAmount}[happiness/] happiness.
你的所有殖民地立刻获得 {happinessAmount}[happiness/]幸福值。

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
